sender_nation_id.description: ID of the nation sending the message. Null for system-generated notifications.

recipient_nation_id.description: ID of the nation receiving the message.

subject.description: The subject line of the message or notification.

body.description: The main content of the message.

message_type.description: The type of the message, used for filtering and display.

is_read.description: True if the recipient has read the message.

related_entity_id.description: An optional ID linking the message to a specific entity (e.g., a War ID for a battle report).

related_page.description: An optional page name to link to when the notification is clicked (e.g., 'WarRoom').
